commit.message:
tree.c (get_file_function_name): Avoid using random seed on GLOBAL_sub_I and GLOBAL_sub_D.


	* tree.c (get_file_function_name): Avoid using random seed on GLOBAL_sub_I
	and GLOBAL_sub_D.
